Package io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders

Interface DefaultPersonBaseliner

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultModelBuilder
public interface DefaultPersonBaseliner
Default logic for producing a per‑person ImmutablePersonBaseline.

This interface provides a focused default implementation for person baselining that populates persistent person attributes such as mobility baseline, compliance, app use probability and symptom test characteristics. It centralises the common per‑person baseline logic so that alternative builders can reuse or replace it easily.

Role in composition: DefaultModelBuilder implements this interface and delegates person baselining to the default method via DefaultPersonBaseliner.super.baselinePerson(...). This explicit delegation keeps the wiring clear: callers may use the concrete DefaultModelBuilder or substitute a different baseliner by implementing this interface or by subclassing the model builder and overriding the delegation point.

Behaviour and sequencing: the default method adjusts the outbreak's execution configuration for the individual's demographic group (using ReflectionUtils.modify(X, io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.PartialDemographicAdjustment, io.github.ai4ci.abm.PersonDemographic)), initialises the person's state machine and samples distributional entries. The method is intended to be invoked after setup and before initialisation of runtime person state; in particular it assumes the outbreak's execution configuration and demographic adjustment are available.

Extension guidance: implementers who replace this default should preserve the contract that the method returns a built ImmutablePersonBaseline and should avoid heavy IO or long running tasks inside the method unless coordinated by the calling builder. For compute heavy per‑person work consider precomputing aggregates during outbreak baselining.

Author:
Rob Challen

  • Method Details

    • baselinePerson

      default io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonBaseline baselinePerson(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonBaseline.Builder builder, Person person, Sampler rng)
      Build a per‑person baseline from the supplied person and the outbreak's execution configuration.

      The default implementation performs these steps:

      1. Adjust the outbreak execution configuration using the person's demographic via ReflectionUtils.modify(X, io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.PartialDemographicAdjustment, io.github.ai4ci.abm.PersonDemographic).
      2. Initialise the person's state machine with the configured default behaviour model.
      3. Sample distributional entries from the adjusted configuration to populate mobility, compliance and app use probabilities.
      4. Set symptom sensitivity, specificity and self‑isolation depth from the adjusted configuration.

      Composition note: when used from DefaultModelBuilder this method is invoked by the builder's delegation and therefore forms the canonical per‑person baseline behaviour for the default builder.

      Parameters:
      builder - the person baseline builder to populate
      person - the person for whom the baseline is being built
      rng - random sampler used to sample distributional entries
      Returns:
      the built ImmutablePersonBaseline
